metadata.title: CVE-2014-8750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Race condition in the VMware driver in OpenStack Compute (Nova) before2014.1.4 and 2014.2 before 2014.2rc1 allows remote authenticated users toaccess unintended consoles by spawning an instance that triggers the sameVNC port to be allocated to two different instances.

criterions.comment: nova: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
